metadata.title: CVE-2017-5977 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The zzip_mem_entry_extra_block function in memdisk.c in zziplib 0.13.62allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid memory readand crash) via a crafted ZIP file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5977` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzzip-0-13 - 0.13.62-3ubuntu0.16.04.1
zziplib-bin - 0.13.62-3ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zziplib package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.13.62-3ubuntu0.16.04.1').
